name: hot springs towel set
notes:
materials
- 1 (3, 9) balls of purl soho’s [june worsted][1], 70% organically grown cotton and 30% linen. each ball of this worsted/aran-weight yarn is 164 yards/ 100 grams; approximately 65 (480, 1395) yards required. we used the colors pale denim and peach canyon.
- us 7 (4.5 mm), straight or 24-inch circular [knitting needles][2]
- if using straight needles, for washcloth and hand towel: two us 7 [double pointed needles][3] for i-cord

gauge
21 stitches and 26 rows = 4 inches in stitch pattern

sizes
washcloth (hand towel, bath towel)

finished dimensions: 6¾ inches wide x 9 inches long (17¼ inches wide x 30 inches long, 29½ inches wide x 50 inches long)

designed by purl soho designer, [gianna mueller][4]. see more of gianna’s designs [on her instagram][5]!


  [1]: https://www.purlsoho.com/june-worsted.html
  [2]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles--straight_needles.html
  [3]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--double_pointed_needles.html
  [4]: https://www.purlsoho.com/create/tag/gianna-mueller-for-purl-soho/
